message.content: {"id": "10022", "title": "Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement", "description": "When using the Java perspective, the \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled.", "OB": "The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled in the Java perspective.", "EB": "The \"Build\" action should only be enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective when there are buildable artifacts in the current project.", "SR": "Update the code to correctly enable the \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu only when there are buildable artifacts in the current project while using the Java perspective."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
